glosses: to doze off, to nod off

examples.translation: My grandfather always dozes off while watching TV.

etymology:
From *uyïkla- (“to doze off”), from Proto-Turkic *ūdï-ku (“sleep”), whence uyku (“sleep”).
Cognate with
Bashkir йоҡлау (yoqlaw), Kazakh ұйықтау (ūiyqtau), Kumyk юхламакъ (yuxlamaq), Crimean Tatar yuqlamaq, Kyrgyz укта- (ukta-), Southern Altai уйуктаар (uyuktaar), Chulym уқла- (uqla, “to sleep”), Uzbek uxlamoq, Uyghur ئۇخلىماق (uxlimaq), Turkmen uklamak (“to sleep”). See more at uyumak, uyku.
